CustomField.formula: IF( Current_Last_Year__c ="LAST YEAR",Case(MONTH(TODAY()),1, Q3_Revenue_Amount__c ,2,Q3_Revenue_Amount__c,3, Q3_Revenue_Amount__c,4, Q4_Revenue_Amount__c,5, Q4_Revenue_Amount__c,6, Q4_Revenue_Amount__c,7, Q1_Revenue_Amount__c, 8, Q1_Revenue_Amount__c, 9, Q1_Revenue_Amount__c, 10, Q2_Revenue_Amount__c, 11, Q2_Revenue_Amount__c, 12, Q2_Revenue_Amount__c, 0),0)
CustomField.label: Current QTR Revenue Last Year
